forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 11C. WNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
